summary: Stand-alone retextured vanilla armor inspired by band Dark Funeral.
descriptionHtml:
This is retexture of General Tullius armor with Imperial Full helm and Daedric boots & gloves.
This won\'t replace anything as armor is stand-alone.
The look is inspired by band Dark Funeral\'s latest album covers. Maybe little more red, but still infernal look. Gloves and boots are little bit different color because the glowing effect. I didn\'t change glowing, only the basic textures.

To get armor in game, type in console:
help \"dark funeral\" 0 
to find out id\'s of armor. Then add them to your inventory typing:
player.additem (armor id) 1

I may add them to some barrel or chest in skyrim later to find.
author: raatorotta
